snippet: The company’s announcement of productions solely by white male playwrights led to protests on social media, followed by a change.
abstract: Manhattan Theater Club faces criticism when first seven plays announced for 2015-16 season are ones written by white men; artistic director Lynne Meadow denies discriminatory practice and announces that eighth and final play of lineup will be world premiere of The Ruins of Civilization by British playwright Penelope Skinner.
lead_paragraph: The company’s announcement of productions solely by white male playwrights led to protests on social media, followed by a change.

headline.main: Internet Outcry Over Diversity Leads Manhattan Theater Club to Announce Season Details Early
headline.print_headline: Amid Internet Outcry, Theater Adds to Lineup
